markets.question: Will Donald Trump still be US President on July 1, 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if Donald Trump remains the sitting President of the United States on July 1, 2026. Resolves NO if he resigns, is removed from office, or is otherwise no longer President.

markets.question: Will there be a US government shutdown in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if the US federal government experiences a partial or full shutdown at any point during 2026. Resolves NO if no shutdown occurs.

markets.question: Will Bitcoin reach $150,000 in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if Bitcoin (BTC) trades at or above $150,000 USD on any major exchange (Coinbase, Binance, Kraken) at any point during 2026. Price must be sustained for at least 1 hour.

markets.question: Will Bitcoin reach $200,000 in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if Bitcoin (BTC) trades at or above $200,000 USD on any major exchange at any point during 2026.

markets.question: Will Ethereum reach $10,000 in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if Ethereum (ETH) trades at or above $10,000 USD on any major exchange at any point during 2026.

markets.question: Will Solana reach $500 in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if Solana (SOL) trades at or above $500 USD on any major exchange at any point during 2026.

markets.question: Will SUI reach $10 in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if SUI token trades at or above $10 USD on any major exchange at any point during 2026.

markets.question: Will OpenAI release GPT-5 in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if OpenAI officially releases a model branded as 'GPT-5' or its successor to GPT-4 to the public (API or ChatGPT) at any point during 2026.

markets.question: Will AI achieve AGI by end of 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if a credible AI research organization (OpenAI, Google DeepMind, Anthropic) officially claims to have achieved Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) by December 31, 2026.

markets.question: Will Google surpass OpenAI as #1 AI company in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if Google/DeepMind is widely considered the leading AI company by major tech publications (TechCrunch, Wired, The Verge) as of December 31, 2026.

markets.question: Who will win the 2026 FIFA World Cup?
markets.description: This market resolves to the country that wins the 2026 FIFA World Cup Final. The tournament is hosted by USA, Canada, and Mexico.

markets.question: Will USA reach World Cup 2026 Semi-Finals?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if the United States Men's National Team reaches the semi-finals of the 2026 FIFA World Cup (hosted in USA, Canada, Mexico).

markets.question: Will LeBron James retire in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if LeBron James officially announces his retirement from the NBA at any point during 2026.

markets.question: Will there be a US recession in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if the NBER officially declares a recession in the United States during 2026, or if GDP contracts for two consecutive quarters.

markets.question: Will the Fed cut rates below 3% in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if the Federal Reserve's target federal funds rate falls below 3% at any point during 2026.

markets.question: Will NVIDIA remain the largest company by market cap in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if NVIDIA is the largest company by market capitalization on December 31, 2026.

markets.question: Will Apple release AR glasses in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if Apple officially releases consumer AR glasses (not Vision Pro) to the public in 2026.

markets.question: Will Tesla release a $25,000 car in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if Tesla begins deliveries of a vehicle with a base price of $25,000 USD or less in the United States during 2026.

markets.question: Will SpaceX IPO in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if SpaceX completes an Initial Public Offering (IPO) and begins trading on a public stock exchange during 2026.

markets.question: Will Russia-Ukraine war end in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if a formal ceasefire or peace agreement is signed between Russia and Ukraine during 2026.

markets.question: Will China invade Taiwan in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if China initiates a military invasion or blockade of Taiwan during 2026.

markets.question: Will North Korea conduct a nuclear test in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if North Korea conducts a confirmed nuclear weapon test during 2026.

markets.question: Will GTA 6 release in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if Grand Theft Auto 6 is officially released and available to purchase/play on any platform during 2026.

markets.question: Will Taylor Swift announce retirement in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if Taylor Swift officially announces her retirement from music or touring during 2026.

markets.question: Which movie will gross the most in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves to the highest-grossing film worldwide in 2026. YES = Avatar 3 or major sequel. NO = Original or other film.

markets.question: Will humans land on Mars in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if any human successfully lands on the surface of Mars during 2026.

markets.question: Will a commercial fusion reactor go online in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if any commercial fusion power plant begins producing electricity for the grid during 2026.

markets.question: Will the US pass stablecoin legislation in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if the US Congress passes comprehensive stablecoin regulation that is signed into law during 2026.

markets.question: Will a country adopt Bitcoin as legal tender in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if any country (besides El Salvador and CAR) officially adopts Bitcoin as legal tender during 2026.

markets.question: Will Elon Musk remain in government role through 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if Elon Musk maintains any official government position (DOGE or other) through December 31, 2026.
